posts.post_title: FS T206 HOFers, SLer, etc.***Moved to ebay***
posts.post_content:
Narrowing my collection focus a bit. My apologies for the smallish scans. Please PM me with your email address if interested and I can email larger scans.

T206 Red Ames Hands at Chest - New York Giants - P150 VG - ebay
T206 Red Ames Hands at Chest - New York Giants - SC150F25 SGC40 - ebay
T206 Roy Ellam SLer - Nashville - P350 PSA2 - ebay
T206 Rube Marquard Portrait HOFer - NY Giants SC350F25 BVG 1.5 - $old
T206 Vic Willis Batting HOFer - St. Louis Cardinals P350 BVG 1.5 - ebay

Free shipping! PP F&F preferred. Please PM me if interested. "I'll take it" trumps ongoing negotiations.

Thanks for looking!

Best,

Steve
